basic_information.scholarship_name: LTC Oren Lee Peters Endowed ROTC Scholarship

description: To provide scholarship funds for Cadets in the Army ROTC program. Eligibility Requirements Must be a contracted ROTC Cadet Cumulative GPA 3.0 or higher Personal statement in Army memorandum format detailing the financial need and reasons for participating in Army ROTC and why you are the best candidate for selection No previous administrative suspension or probation for academics Passing score on the Army Combat Fitness Test at time of application ROTC instructor recommendation Previous winners are not eligible for scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
